nodes.text: Spiz's gang were a gang of young miscreants who terrorized the slums of Coruscant prior to the Clone Wars. They were lead by Spiz and included a H'nemthe, a Kubaz and a number of other aliens.
One of their frequent victims was a young alien whom they beat up for fun. On one such occasion, in 27 BBY, they were scared off by a Force illusion of a rancor created by Jedi Master Yarael Poof.
